label: I’m cold!
idiom:
한눈팔면 마물의 저녁밥이 될 테니까요. : If you let your guard down, you'll be monster food.
평생 먹고살 걱정이 없을 정도다. : I have enough to live comfortably for a lifetime.
황금 길을 걸어가는 모습만 확인하고, : I just need to see him walk the path to success.
한가로운 생활을 보내면 땡이었다. : I could just enjoy a carefree life, and that would be it.

hangle: 시그렌을 결혼시키고 평화로운 곳에서 노후 생활을 보내야 해요.
first_translate: I have to marry off siegren and live out my old age in a peaceful place.
idiom_translate: I have to get siegren married and spend my later years in a peaceful place.
label: I need to see  siegren get married and then spend the rest of my days in the peaceful countryside.
idiom:
한눈팔면 마물의 저녁밥이 될 테니까요. : If you let your guard down, you'll be monster food.
평생 먹고살 걱정이 없을 정도다. : I have enough to live comfortably for a lifetime.
황금 길을 걸어가는 모습만 확인하고, : I just need to see him walk the path to success.
한가로운 생활을 보내면 땡이었다. : I could just enjoy a carefree life, and that would be it.
